    The Waterstones Round Up: March's Best Books

    Spring is here and brilliant books are very much in bloom. Check out our favourites on the blog.

    Bonnie Garmus on the Origin of Elizabeth Zott

    Bonnie Garmus, author of Lessons in Chemistry, our Fiction Book of the Month for March, provides a little background detail on her magnificent heroine, Elizabeth Zott.

    Alice Winn on the Background to In Memoriam

    Alice Winn, author of the stunning debut In Memoriam, reveals the heartbreaking First World War In Memoriams that inspired the novel.

    The Waterstones Children's Book Prize Blog: Nadia Mikail

    The overall winner of this year's Waterstones Children's Book Prize spotlights the children's book that changed her life.
